about_the_game:
"Keyboard Maestro Voyage" is a music game that simulates realistic performances by using a MIDI keyboard as a controller. Play the keyboard in sync with various flowing notes and experience a real performance.

[Features]
■ Simple: A classic-style music game that's easy to understand - just play in time with the flowing notes.
■ Tutorial: Even users who are not familiar with the keyboard can learn how to play through the tutorial.
■ Quick: You can choose a song and score and start playing immediately.
■ Casual: You can play for about 2 minutes per song.
■ Step Up: Play songs that match your skill level with nine levels of difficulty.
■ Multiple Parts: Each song has multiple parts.
■ Options: You can choose various options to suit your play style.
■ Assist: Auto play is available for those who just want to practice the keyboard.
■ Realistic Approach: It uses a real MIDI keyboard.
■ Bend: Not only the keyboard but also the operation of pitch bend and modulation are reproduced.
■ All Original Songs: All the songs in this game are 100% original.


[Terms]
■ MIDI Keyboard: A keyboard controller for inputting MIDI information into a PC or other instruments.
■ Pitch Bend: A feature commonly found in synthesizers, etc., which allows you to move the pitch of the sound up and down during performance.
■ Modulation: A feature commonly found in synthesizers, etc., which allows you to sway (vibrate) the sound during performance.

"Keyboard Maestro Voyage" is a music game that simulates realistic performances by using a MIDI keyboard as a controller. Play the keyboard in sync with various flowing notes and experience a real performance.

[Features]
■ Simple: A classic-style music game that's easy to understand - just play in time with the flowing notes.
■ Tutorial: Even users who are not familiar with the keyboard can learn how to play through the tutorial.

■ Multiple Parts: Each song has multiple parts.
■ Options: You can choose various options to suit your play style.
■ Assist: Auto play is available for those who just want to practice the keyboard.
■ Realistic Approach: It uses a real MIDI keyboard.
■ Bend: Not only the keyboard but also the operation of pitch bend and modulation are reproduced.
■ All Original Songs: All the songs in this game are 100% original.


[Terms]
■ MIDI Keyboard: A keyboard controller for inputting MIDI information into a PC or other instruments.
■ Pitch Bend: A feature commonly found in synthesizers, etc., which allows you to move the pitch of the sound up and down during performance.
■ Modulation: A feature commonly found in synthesizers, etc., which allows you to sway (vibrate) the sound during performance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10以上
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: "Keyboard Maestro Voyage" is a music game using a MIDI keyboard, simulating real performances. Play in sync with flowing notes in this classic-style game. Start quickly by simply choosing a song and sheet music.
